title: Ghislaine Maxwell Trial: Jury Hears Closing Arguments
sub_head: Prosecutors told the jury that Ms. Maxwell was a sophisticated predator; defense says she is a scapegoat for Jeffrey Epstein
body:
Lawyers offered clashing portraits of Ghislaine Maxwell during closing arguments on Monday, with prosecutors portraying the British socialite as a sophisticated predator and defense attorneys describing her as a scapegoat for Jeffrey Epstein.
“Ghislaine Maxwell was dangerous,” said Assistant U.S. Attorney Alison Moe. “She was a grown woman who preyed on vulnerable kids.”
